history.content:
Announcement from the Stats Department below. Please direct questions to stat-enrollments@berkeley.edu.
Please note the following pending changes and recent updates to Spring 2022 Statistics Courses below.

Pending Changes
Stat 2
A proposal has been submitted to offer the Stat 2 Lecture online. We anticipate it will be reviewed this Friday, October 15, 2021. If approved, we plan to offer the Stat 2 lecture asynchronously and online with in-person, synchronous lab sections. Check the Statistics Enrollment web page on Monday, October 18, 2021 for Stat 2 enrollment updates.

Stat 20
We have submitted a proposal to offer the Stat 20 lecture online. If approved, we are planning to offer Lecture 1 in-person (100 students) which will be recorded and offered online to students enrolled in Lecture 2 (550 students). All lab sections will be synchronous and in person for both the online and in-person lectures. Currently, only enrollment for the in-person Lec 1 is available.

Students wishing to be informed when Stat 20 Lec 2 will be open for enrollment can either add themselves to the Stat 20 Lec 1 waitlist or check our Statistics Enrollment web page on Monday, October 18, 2021, for Stat 20 updates. Labs for both lectures will be offered TTh every hour beginning at 8am and ending at 6pm.

Other Recent Updates
Stat 133 lecture time recently changed to MWF 1-2pm.
Stat 151A will NOT be offered in Spring 2022 (there seemed to be some confusion because this course was showing up in Schedule Builder but not in the Class Schedule).
Stat 152 - Because an instructor has not been identified yet, the course is not currently open for enrollment but we do hope to offer it.
Stat 154 lecture time was recently changed to TTh 5-6:30pm.
Stat 157 was published to the Class Schedule last week and will be offered MWF 11am-12pm. The topic is on Forecasting. Prerequisite is Stat 134. 
We plan to update the Statistics Enrollment web page with a Spring 2022 Course Information spreadsheet containing more enrollment details on Wednesday, Oct. 13th. Students with additional questions after that time may email stat-enrollments@berkeley.edu.
Best,
Denise Yee and Natalie Poulos
history.subject: Spring 2022 Statistics Scheduling Updates
